block_comment: This block of code implements a register for Program Counter (PC) in synchronization with a positive edge of "clk" (clock) signal or a negative edge of "reset_n" signal. When the system reset ("reset_n") is active, the PC register ("F_pc") initializes to the specified hexadecimal value (67108864). Otherwise, if the PC register enable ("F_pc_en") is active, it allows updates of the value of PC with the next PC value ("F_pc_nxt").
